POSE pipeline - MM

This tutorial walks through the POSE pipeline for a single modality. The pipeline is demonstrated on multiple myeloma (MM) rna data restricted to the apoptosis pathway.

MM POSE tutorial

POSE pipeline - BC

This tutorial walks through the POSE pipeline for a single modality. The pipeline is demonstrated on breast cancer (BC) rna data from TCGA.

BC POSE tutorial
